metadata.title: CVE-2024-36618 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: FFmpeg n6.1.1 has a vulnerability in the AVI demuxer of the libavformatlibrary which allows for an integer overflow, potentially resulting in adenial-of-service (DoS) condition.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
